item.title: Smiling
item.description: There is an article making the rounds online, AI and the American Smile, that is a very interesting look at the social construction of the meaning of a smile. I found it rather interesting especially since my facial expressions have been a constant source of problems for me. Doing a search for autism facial expressions leads to a wealth of articles and papers discussing the problems that people with spectrum disorders have in reading facial expressions and having their own moods misrepresented.
